author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Wilmar International Posts Q4 Net Profit $‍427.5​ Million
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Wilmar International Ltd:
* Q4 NET PROFIT $‍427.5​ MILLION VERSUS $560.8 MILLION A YEAR AGO
* QTRLY REVENUE $11,548.0 MILLION VERSUS $11,947.2 MILLION A YEAR AGO
* ‍PROPOSED A FINAL TAX EXEMPT (ONE-TIER) DIVIDEND OF S$0.07 PER SHARE​
* “BARRING UNFORESEEN CIRCUMSTANCES, PERFORMANCE IN 2018 IS EXPECTED TO BE SATISFACTORY”
* “WE CONTINUE TO WORK ON PROPOSED LISTING OF OUR CHINA OPERATIONS, WITH INTERNAL RESTRUCTURING OF OPERATIONS LARGELY COMPLETED” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
